text: The tenant must remit rent by the 5th. Account number 110-222-3333333 should be used. Payment receipts are stored for 12 months.

title: Payment Obligations

text: Penalty interest of 10% applies when rent is late for 30 days. Late fee caps at 1,000,000 KRW.

title: Penalty Terms
